case_title: PATCHALA SEETHARAMAIAH vs COMMISSIONER OF INCOME-TAX and another

key_points.constitutional_reference: Article 265 of the Constitution of India

judgment_summary.issue: Refund of tax paid under a void declaration due to delayed payment.
judgment_summary.court_ruling: The petitioner is entitled to a refund of the tax paid as the declaration was deemed void under Section 67(2) of the scheme.
judgment_summary.reasoning: Retention of tax paid under a void declaration violates Article 265 of the Constitution of India. Section 70 does not apply to void declarations.

direction.action: Refund the tax paid under the declaration dated December 27, 1997.
direction.deadline: Within two months from receipt of the order
direction.adjustment_clause: Unless adjustment is made towards any arrears.
